media.description: When idea becomes mainstream with significant media coverage

iv.description: Implied volatility spike indicates market awareness

price.description: Price has captured majority of expected move

full_exit.action: Exit full position, edge has dissipated

cockroach_rule.rationale: First cockroach indicates more problems ahead

finerman_corollary.rationale: Don't rationalize holding a broken thesis

ma_200.rationale: Long-term trend has turned, tighten stops

thesis_break.rationale: When reason for holding changes, exit immediately

activist_warn_filing.trigger: WARN Act filing with 'loss of contract' language
activist_warn_filing.rationale: Loss of major contract invalidates activist thesis (operational fix unlikely)
activist_warn_filing.implementation: Monitor state WARN Act databases for company. Parse filing text for contract loss language. If detected, trigger immediate exit.

note: Check hard exits BEFORE info parity. Hard exits override all other considerations.
